section.p: If you can help with translations in German, Spanish or any other language, please send me an email at yveszoundi at users dot sf dot net. I am using babelfish for translations :-). I am struggling with Antlr and syntax higlighting. If you have experience with it and want to contribute, I would be glad to hear from you.
The 1.0.0RC2 release is planned for the end of August. I will try to integrate Antlr before the end of the year.
